helpMessage:
Available commands:

>helen train [{departure} {arrival}] [time] [show {x}]

Shows a list of trains and their departure time going from {departure} to {arrival}. If no departure and arrival stations are set, the default will be Algiers -> OuedSmar if the clock is <12, and OuedSmar -> Algiers otherwise.

Parameters: 
departure: Departure station ex: alger
arrival: Arrival station ex: ouedsmar
time: Finds trains departing beyond this time ex : 15:00
show x: Shows the next x trains, default 2
------------------------------

>helen weather [location]

Shows the weather forecast for [location], default Algiers

Parameters:
location: The location you're looking the weather for

>helen hijri

Shows today's Hijri date
------------------------------

>helen poke

Pokes Helen, try it ;)
------------------------------

>helen covid

Shows the most recent covid-19 stats
------------------------------

>helen help

Shows this help message
